shabdakoshakaryalaye katayuthu kirima pahasuwima sadaha ehi athi adupadu ikmanin piyawimata idiriyedi katayuthu karanawa.jathika bhasha ha samaja eekabaddhatha amathya wasudewa nanayakkara mahatha mese pawasiya.....thraibhashitha shabdakoshaya eli dakwima wishala sandhisthanayak lesa penwa diya hakiyi.api thraibhashika prathipaththiyak anugamanaya karana ratak lesa bhasha thunama dana ganima itha wadagath.wisheshayen pradhana bhasha deka danaganima ema bhasha deke danuma huwamarukaraganimin jathin athara hrudayangama badimak athi kara gatha hakiyi.kalaniya wishwa widyalaye wag widya adhyananshaye mahacharya wilsan rajapaksha mahatha mese pawasiya....shabdakoshayaka mulika eekakaya wachanayayi.loka ithihasaye wachanaya mulwu swadhina shabdakoshayak bihiwuye kristhu purwa 3500 diyi.ee sumeriyanwaru thama daruwanta bhawitha kirima sadaha wachana gonukara matipuwaruwala kala shabdakoshayayi.ee samagama chinayeth mewani shabdakosha bihiwuna.me awasthawa sadaha parlimenthu manthri purawidya chakrawarthi ellawala medhanandha nahimi, sinhala shabdakoshaye karthru akuratiye nanda himiyo, mahacharya angulugaha dhammananda nahimi, thrikunamalaye aananda nahimi athulu maha sangaruwana, aacharya oswald gomis wishramika agaradaguru thuma, sanskrutha ha kala katayuthu amathyanshaye lekam wasantha eekanayaka, sanskruthika katayuthu adhyaksha wijith kanugala, mahacharya warun wana wimal ji.balagalla, je.bi.disanayaka, wilsan rajapaksha, rathnasiri arangala, aacharya sandagomi koparahewa, yana mahathwarun athulu mahacharya waru aacharya waru athulu widwathun wishala pirisak mema awasthawata ek wuha. .
